Kimbap making

Learn how to make beautiful artistic sushi

kimbap-making

Your local friend:

Ulla

About:

Ulla is a kimbap lover and she makes a mean lean kimbap.

Course Details:

Location: Seoul, South Korea

Duration: 1 day

Level: Beginner

Price: $60 USD

What you'll learn:

Learn how to make beautiful kimbap, everything from picking the right kind of rice, to washing the rice and picking the ingredients.

Where we'll be:

Itaweon, Seoul, South Korea

What I'll provide:

I will show you how to prepare kimbap, was rice and pick the right ingredients.

Good to know

Make sure you arrive hungry as we will be eating lots of yummy kimbap at the end of the day.

Where we'll meet:

Itaweon, Seoul, South Korea
